item.title: Google Plans $6 Billion Data Center Expansion In India’s Visakhapatnam: Report
item.description: Google $6 billion investment reportedly includes $2 billion for renewable energy capacity that will be used to power the new facility.

item.title: Imunon Doses First Patient With Experimental Cancer Drug In Late-Stage Trial: Retail Thinks Company Is Undervalued
item.description: The trial is evaluating IMNN-001 in the treatment of women with newly diagnosed advanced ovarian cancer.

item.title: Why Is Vertiv Stock Rising Today? Here’s What The CEO Said About Capacity Expansion And Innovation Pipeline
item.description: Vertiv’s Q2 revenue jumped 35% year-on-year to $2.64 billion, beating the analysts’ consensus estimate of $2.36 billion, as per Fiscal AI data.
